author: timbeiko
content: It seems there has been a decent amount of activity on 4844 over the past month - should we set up a community call sometime next week to debrief and align on next steps?

author: timbeiko
content: If there's interest, I'd propose Wed 14:00 UTC

author: bridge-bot
content: <tyneslol> We should be sure to include worldcoin because they have a trusted setup coordinator implemented

author: sauliusgrigaitis
content: FYI if anyone looking for Rust port of c-kzg you can check https://github.com/sifraitech/kzg . There are also experiments with a few different ECC libraries besides blst. This semester we are going to update the codebase  for the 4844. There are also plans to write bindings for other languages.

author: sauliusgrigaitis
content: Thanks, I wasn’t aware of proxima-one/kzg, but it doesn’t look similar to c-kzg, so it would take more efforts for 4844 compared to sifraitech/kzg.
